articles.title: "Without Political Agenda Or Bias...": Rahul Dravid Opens Up On Tough Selection Calls - NDTV Sports
articles.description: Rahul Dravid admitted that making selection calls is the toughest part of the job for a coach.
articles.content: While critics will always find ways to raise questions, the job of a coach remains incredibly hard. When it comes to making selection calls, be it in the playing XI or for the squad as a whole, the câ€¦ [+2353 chars]
